argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_recn | |- ( A e. RR -> A e. CC ) |
| 2 |  | #P_recn | |- ( B e. RR -> B e. CC ) |
| 3 |  | #P_efival | |- ( A e. CC -> ( exp ` ( _i x. A ) ) = ( ( cos ` A ) + ( _i x. ( sin ` A ) ) ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_efival | |- ( B e. CC -> ( exp ` ( _i x. B ) ) = ( ( cos ` B ) + ( _i x. ( sin ` B ) ) ) ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_eqeqan12d | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC ) -> ( ( exp ` ( _i x. A ) ) = ( exp ` ( _i x. B ) ) <-> ( ( cos ` A ) + ( _i x. ( sin ` A ) ) ) = ( ( cos ` B ) + ( _i x. ( sin ` B ) ) ) ) ) |
| 6 | 1, 2, 5 | #P_syl2an | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR ) -> ( ( exp ` ( _i x. A ) ) = ( exp ` ( _i x. B ) ) <-> ( ( cos ` A ) + ( _i x. ( sin ` A ) ) ) = ( ( cos ` B ) + ( _i x. ( sin ` B ) ) ) ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_recoscl | |- ( A e. RR -> ( cos ` A ) e. RR ) |
| 8 |  | #P_resincl | |- ( A e. RR -> ( sin ` A ) e. RR ) |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_jca | |- ( A e. RR -> ( ( cos ` A ) e. RR /\ ( sin ` A ) e. RR ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_recoscl | |- ( B e. RR -> ( cos ` B ) e. RR ) |
| 11 |  | #P_resincl | |- ( B e. RR -> ( sin ` B ) e. RR ) |
| 12 | 10, 11 | #P_jca | |- ( B e. RR -> ( ( cos ` B ) e. RR /\ ( sin ` B ) e. RR ) ) |
| 13 |  | #P_cru | |- ( ( ( ( cos ` A ) e. RR /\ ( sin ` A ) e. RR ) /\ ( ( cos ` B ) e. RR /\ ( sin ` B ) e. RR ) ) -> ( ( ( cos ` A ) + ( _i x. ( sin ` A ) ) ) = ( ( cos ` B ) + ( _i x. ( sin ` B ) ) ) <-> ( ( cos ` A ) = ( cos ` B ) /\ ( sin ` A ) = ( sin ` B ) ) ) ) |
| 14 | 9, 12, 13 | #P_syl2an | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR ) -> ( ( ( cos ` A ) + ( _i x. ( sin ` A ) ) ) = ( ( cos ` B ) + ( _i x. ( sin ` B ) ) ) <-> ( ( cos ` A ) = ( cos ` B ) /\ ( sin ` A ) = ( sin ` B ) ) ) ) |
| 15 | 6, 14 | #P_bitrd | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR ) -> ( ( exp ` ( _i x. A ) ) = ( exp ` ( _i x. B ) ) <-> ( ( cos ` A ) = ( cos ` B ) /\ ( sin ` A ) = ( sin ` B ) ) ) ) |
